definitions.definition: A sterol lipid synthesized by the liver and transported in the bloodstream to the membranes of all animal cells ; it plays a central role in many biochemical processes and, as a lipoprotein that coats the walls of blood vessels , is associated with cardiovascular disease .
The level of cholesterol in the body.
examples: improve your cholesterol ; lower your cholesterol

main_definition: ( biochemistry ) A sterol lipid synthesized by the liver and transported in the bloodstream to the membranes of all animal cells ; it plays a central role in many biochemical processes and, as a lipoprotein that coats the walls of blood vessels , is associated with cardiovascular disease .
secondary_definitions: The level of cholesterol in the body.
